definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
old habits are hard to change (idiom)

sentences.english: Her husband is an incorrigible flirt .
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫是個積習難改的調情老手。

sentences.english: You must have an iron will to have given up smoking after all those years.
sentences.chinese: 那麼多年抽菸的積習都能戒掉，你的意志力一定很強。

sentences.english: The country is beset by chronic and dangerous weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家備受積習已久的危險弱點困擾。

sentences.english: He told us a story to illustrate the fact that bad habits die hard.
sentences.chinese: 他通過給我們講故事來闡明積習難改的事實。
